text: 14.15: Jer 51.33; Jol 3.13; VB 14.18; 16.17Gu garavra kim, harigi enser mbe, ana Fhe Bakɨme Phena vhen kegap, kɨrar hɨgi. Ana hɨgap, khɨrɨp, mba buiva hura perigi guman kaav, khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu won kos ndigi ŋgɨp, won mba gorɨ. Kha nuianan ki mba za gɨvigi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ntigem mba mba gorɨrga tuk ma.”
